2014-12-22|2014-12-28.description:
The purpose of the Earth Engines is determined, and The Monitor arrives on Gaslight Earth to help the heroes dismantle them. But Luthor declares them to be too dangerous to tamper with.

Note: One digital retailer released this issue early (10/24/2014).
2014-12-22|2014-12-28.name: Chapter Thirty-One

volume.name: Infinite Crisis: Fight For the Multiverse

2014-12-29|2015-01-04.description:
ARMORINES…ATTACK!

Aric of Dacia has laid waste to entire planets and defeated the universe’s most skilled hunters, but how can he kill what he can’t see? A strange new foe with a fiendishly familiar leader has unleashed a relentless offensive on Aric of Dacia, and he doesn’t even know it yet! Be here for the deadliest foe X-O Manowar has battled yet, as the ARMORINES continue their march towards Aric’s destruction!

2014-02-24|2014-03-02.description:
While strategically secluded in Northampton, the Turtles are hit by new revelations involving enemies' shifting loyalties, miracle cures, and ghosts from the past. And in the present, grave danger is about to strike! What new Foot Clan menace is hunting the Turtles?

BCover BKevin Eastman2

2014-03-10|2014-03-16.description:
Part 1 of an epic all-new 2-part adventure set within the continuity of the blockbuster STAR TREK films! Captain Kirk and the crew have never faced a threat like the one they face now: their own ship! Don't miss the first chapter of "I, Enterprise", overseen by STAR TREK writer-producer Roberto Orci!

2014-03-31|2014-04-06.description: The Joker's back and he's teaming up with Catwoman. Will Batgirl's help be enough for Batman and Robin to overcome this dastardly duo?
2014-03-31|2014-04-06.name: The Joker's Big Score

2014-04-07|2014-04-13.description: After staying up past their bedtimes, SpongeBob and Patrick vow to go for it and stay up ALL NIGHT. Their mission, to become "Kings of Night"--and the nocturnal antics that ensue are worth donning those night-vision goggles you've been sitting on. Then, Silver Age legend Ramona Fradon (Plastic Man, Metamorpho) joins with Batman scribe Chuck Dixon to weave a tale of Mermaid Man's run in with true love, in a story we could only call "The Lovely Lure of Lady Mackeral." Also in this issue: SpongeBob tries out different shapes to improve business at the Krusty Krabb, and poker-playing Pirates try out a new deck of SpongeBob-themed cards. All this plus "SpongeFunnies" by James Kochalka (Dragon Puncher), tidal trivia by Maris Wicks (Primates), and a back cover by Eleanor Davis (The Secret Science Alliance)!

2014-04-14|2014-04-20.description:
SERIES FINALE! The end of an era! A tale of triumph and tragedy! The GREEN GOBLIN unmasked! A hero reborn! But what does this mean for OTTO OCTAVIUS?!

There's only one man who can save us from the Goblin Nation... PETER PARKER: The one, true SUPERIOR SPIDER-MAN!

2014-04-14|2014-04-20.name: Goblin Nation Conclusion

2014-04-21|2014-04-27.description:
The Tokyo team use their Gantz orb to recruit fellow warriors for a desperate assault to free humans imprisoned on the alien mother ship. But the orb no longer has the power to heal or regenerate them, so if they die on this mission, they stay dead!

Gantz has sold over fifteen million copies in Japan!

Franchise includes anime series and live-action feature.

The team on a suicide mission!
2014-04-21|2014-04-27.name: Volume 31

2014-04-21|2014-04-27.description:
The Avengers battle Brother Voodoo – but how can they stop a sorcerer who can possess any member of the team?!

More action from Brian Michael Bendis, Michael Avon Oeming and Mike Deodato!

Reprints:

  • New Avengers #33-34.
  • Avengers #31-32.

2014-05-05|2014-05-11.description: Batwing faces his most dangerous mission yet – traveling straight into the madness that is The Gotham Underground to put an end to those behind The Uprising! Will Batman, Incorporated be in the market for a new Batwing? Or is our hero ready to prove himself once and for all?
2014-05-05|2014-05-11.name: Into the Dark

2014-05-05|2014-05-11.description:
Death comes to Wayne Manor – and the number one suspect is Bruce Wayne! In order to solve this mystery, Batman’s investigations will lead him to the mysterious man known as Sumo!

List of covers and creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverFrancis Manapul1
ComboCombo CoverFrancis Manapul2
RI1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant CoverMike Allred3
2014-05-05|2014-05-11.name: Icarus, Part Two

2014-05-05|2014-05-11.description: “The Outsiders War” finale, featuring the return of Count Vertigo! As the final shot in this war is fired from his bow – what is left of Green Arrow?
2014-05-05|2014-05-11.name: The Outsiders War, Book Six: Spoils of War

2014-05-05|2014-05-11.description: “UPRISING” part 1! Rebellion has spread across the universe as former allies join forces with the Durlans, Khund and Outer Clanns to overthrow the authority of the Corps. It’s an all-out assault on Mogo, but will the greatest threat come from without – or within? The outcome of the battle, the survival of the Corps and the future of the universe itself rests on the shoulders of Hal Jordan – and after a bruising start to his tenure as Corps leader, he is more than ready for a fight! This new epic continues in this month’s GREEN LANTERN CORPS #31!
2014-05-05|2014-05-11.name: Uprising, Part 1: Battle of Wills

2014-05-05|2014-05-11.description:
“The Gift of the Sureen” reaches its finale as a major new player is revealed to the Swamp Thing’s world! In order to survive the Sureen’s “gift,” Alec Holland must become an entirely different being!

In the temple of the Sureen Alec has just found out that Miki is an avatar as well, the avatar of Mycos - the Grey. Alec asks why he has never heard of the Grey and Miki replies that is because she has abandoned her post as avatar and has been using the Sureen's services to switch bodies for centuries. In Germany at the D.W. AG Research Facility R-18 the scientist have created a suit out of the avatar body so that test subjects can directly link themselves to the "botanical energy field". They show a satellite view of a wheat field that has been destroyed by the tampering in the Green by the scientists.

Back in India Miki is trying to convince Alec that he should continually switch back and forth between bodies but Alec is reluctant. He instead asks that she show him her avatar body. They go visit it in a hidden part of the temple. Alec brings along Gaurav and Capucine, and he asks Gaurav to transfer him into the body so that he can save the host before he dies. Once inside the body Alec has trouble controlling it but ultimately does and he interrogates the former host named Hans Leider. He tells him where the avatar body is being held and Alec goes out to find it. While traveling through the Grey he realizes how empty it is and how similar it feels to the Green now after Alec destroyed the Parliament.

Alec forms out of moldy bread and infiltrates the base attacking the armed guards. He the the avatar body and tells everyone to clear the building as he destroys the facility. When he returns to India he traps Miki and tell Gaurav to switch up all the bodies. Miki goes in the fungus body Alec into Miki and then Alec in the plant body. After the transfer Miki is furious and battles Alec but she is quickly subdued. He tells her that the Grey needs an avatar and he leaves with Capucine and Gaurav. In Louisiana the Wolf and Lady Weeds are verseeing the reconstruction of the house when the Wolf receives a call that the avatar body was stolen and the facility destroyed. It turns out he had orchestrated the whole thing. Suddenly Aquaman appears and menacingly declares: "Which one of you is the Avatar of the Green?!"

Continues in: Aquaman #31 - In the Muck
2014-05-05|2014-05-11.name: The Gift of the Sureen, Part 3 of 3

2014-05-12|2014-05-18.description:
The SUPERMAN: DOOMED epic continues! Superman barely survived his battle with Doomsday and now realizes that his wounds are not healing. Not only that, but he’s suffering disturbing physical and emotional side effects. He is changing…and the newly enlisted Men of S.T.E.E.L. – Metallo, Ghost Soldier, Atomic Skull and Steel – are about to find out into what!

Joker, Catwoman, Riddler, and Catwoman only appear on the variant cover.
2014-05-12|2014-05-18.name: Infected: Chapter 1: True Believers

2014-05-12|2014-05-18.description: An ordinary day takes a turn for the worse when Barbara Gordon must find a way to save her roommate Alysia Yeoh from fan-favorite villain Ragdoll!
2014-05-12|2014-05-18.name: Wrath of the Ragdoll

2014-05-12|2014-05-18.description:
“UPRISING” part 2! As the Corps reels from the Battle for Mogo, John Stewart leads a team of Green Lanterns into the heart of enemy territory on a desperate rescue mission to save the Lanterns abducted by the Durlans and the Khund. This prison break is like nothing you’ve ever seen before! And as the Durlans train their sights on the next battlefield in the war, a long-lost member of the Corps returns! Continued from this month’s GREEN LANTERN #31!

Guy Gardner, Kyle Rayner, Kilowog, Katma Tui, Batman, and Robin only appear on the variant cover.
2014-05-12|2014-05-18.name: Uprising, Part 2: Prison Break

2014-05-12|2014-05-18.description: The son of Superman returns to the present day DC Universe to shape the world into a metahuman-free society. With blood on his hands and murder in his heart, Superboy begins a plan to cure his own genetic disorder and change the future he was born into.
2014-05-12|2014-05-18.name: Delivery

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.description: “The Hunt for Robin” continues! Batman is on the trail of Ra’s al Ghul in the hope of recovering the stolen bodies of Damian and Talia. But when all leads grow cold, he’ll need to call in help – someone who can go where no Bat has gone before. This looks like a job for...Frankenstein?!
2014-05-19|2014-05-25.name: The Hunt for Robin: City of Cold

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.description: The final battle between Batwoman and the Wolf Spider rages across Gotham City! What was hidden in the paintings, and why? A mystery that dates back almost a century is solved, but the danger has never been greater!
2014-05-19|2014-05-25.name: Webs: Blood Money

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.description: In the aftermath of the battle between Mother Eve and Ra’s al Ghul, the Birds must decide what path they will take next – and whether they will take it all together. And who exactly are the Children of Eve?
2014-05-19|2014-05-25.name: Death Jump!

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.description: Kyle and the New Guardians travel to a mysterious dead world that is suddenly full of life…hostile life! And after the revelations seen in GREEN LANTERN: NEW GUARDIANS ANNUAL #2, allowing Kyle to set foot on this world might be the biggest mistake the Guardians ever made…
2014-05-19|2014-05-25.name: Dead World

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.description: The Outlaws come face to face with the bounty hunter calling himself Lobo, but no one’s who they appear to be as Red Hood and Starfire endeavor to save Arsenal from the Main Man.
2014-05-19|2014-05-25.name: The Big Picture, Conclusion

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.description: Beware her rage! Supergirl joins the Red Lanterns and sets out to learn more about her new status in the group! But a surprising new villain tells Kara that she's more alone in the universe than she ever suspected...
2014-05-19|2014-05-25.name: Red Daughter of Krypton, Part 3: Judgement Day, Part 2 of 3

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.description:
An unlikely ally arrives on the eve of the Battle for Olympus… but standing by Wonder Woman’s side is a deadly place to be!

2014-05-19|2014-05-25.name: This Monster's Gone Eleven

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description: Hex is back in the Old West – and he’s joined forces with Tallulah Black to hunt for…the real Jonah Hex? And in the backup story, Madam .44 is lost on a harsh, alien world where she discovers that justice can still be won with a bullet.
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: Bad Intensions; The Other Side, Part Two

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description:
The King of Atlantis vs. the Avatar of the Green! It’s Aquaman against Swamp Thing, with countless lives hanging in the balance! But why – and what does this mean for rest of The New 52? Find out here!

Batman only appears in the Batman '66 Variant cover.
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: In the Muck

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description: The second chapter of “ZERO YEAR – SAVAGE CITY” reveals an entirely new Gotham City. Unraveling the mysteries set forth by the Riddler, Batman must learn to work with his new ally, Lieutenant Jim Gordon, and do whatever it takes to survive!
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: Zero Year: Savage City, Part Two

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description: The Race of Thieves heats up as Catwoman takes on Central City – but the hometown advantage may favor the Rogues!
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: Race of Thieves: Gauntlet

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description:
Zatanna and the team learn more about the origin of Nightmare Nurse – with deadly results for one member in particular!

Mr. Freeze appears on variant cover only.
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: Nightmares

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description: Guy Gardner thought the power of Supergirl would make his team of Red Lanterns unstoppable…but he wasn’t counting on the arrival of the deadliest Red yet: The Judge! When she makes her ruling, the fate of the Red Lanterns, Earth and an entire space sector will hang in the balance!
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: Judgement Day, Part 3 of 3

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description: “SUPERMAN: DOOMED” continues as Superman continues to change. Plus, Lois’s psi powers spike again as we see the looming shadow of Brainiac!
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: Infected: Chapter 4: Lockdown

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description: Future Flash, Future Mirror Master and…Wally West! The future is invading Central City and the fates of Wally West and his Aunt Iris hang in the balance!
2014-05-26|2014-06-01.name: Through a Glass Darkly

2014-05-26|2014-06-01.description:
Olé, olé-olé-olé! CP has gone sports crazy this issue!

Score the winner in the Penguin Cup, go for gold at the Puffle Olympics, and check out your latest 'ball game' fashions with Cadence!

What's more, every issue comes with a unique code to unlock loads of football gear for your penguin and igloo, plus a Treasure Book item, a Puffle Cannon toy and 1500 coins! Go for the win!

2014-06-16|2014-06-22.description:
ORIGINAL SIN tie-in!

Propelled fifty years into the future, the Avengers come face-to-face with the legacy of their actions!
2014-06-16|2014-06-22.name: 500 Into the Future

2014-06-23|2014-06-29.description:
Introducing the new Power Ring! But who is she? What does she want? And how will her presence affect the team?

Robin, the Flash, and the Atom only appear on variant cover.
2014-06-23|2014-06-29.name: Injustice League, Chapter Two: Power Players

2014-06-23|2014-06-29.description: Everybody knows that Itsuki is the most fearsome skater around. With his high-tech Air Gear skates, his moves are so smooth they're almost like flying. But when you're the best, someone always wants to take you down. Action, adventure, and high-stakes competition - and that's just the beginning!
2014-06-23|2014-06-29.name: Vol. 31

2014-06-23|2014-06-29.description: Now that Bonnie’s alive again, the girls plan to take Whitmore College by storm, starting with an Angels & Devils party the Omega Psis are throwing.
2014-06-23|2014-06-29.name: Frat Pack Part 1 of 3

2014-07-07|2014-07-13.description:
Preston uncovers a secret from Deadpool's past that needs immediate attention! But Deadpool and Dazzler are still fighting off Dracula's forces!

The Guardians of the Galaxy (Rocket Raccoon, Groot, and Star Lord) only appear on the GOTG variant cover.

When Princess Bubblegum and Marceline get their driver’s licenses, they have the perfect plan—build a giant ramp and drive off of it! It’s gonna be so much fun…wait, who’s the Mnemonoid, and why is he all up in this comic?

ICEMAN UNLEASHED! Young Bobby Drake takes to the offensive!

For someone who's said she doesn't find him particularly pleasant to be around, Laura seems to have taken an odd interest in Warren.

  • Chapter 274: Bewildered!! (五里霧中!! Gorimuchū!!)
  • Chapter 275: The Mist Bamboozlement!! (霧の幻惑!! Kiri no Genwaku!!)
  • Chapter 276: True Worth of the Year and a Half!! (一年半の真価!! Ichinen-han no Shinka!!)

2014-09-22|2014-09-28.description:
THE PUNISHER VS. THE THUNDERBOLTS, PART FIVE!

Finally! The fight you’ve craved since Thunderbolts #1—RED HULK vs. PUNISHER!

Soldier/monster vs. soldier/killer for the fate of the Thunderbolts team!
2014-09-22|2014-09-28.name: The Punisher vs. The Thunderbolts Part Five

2014-10-20|2014-10-26.description: Batman faces some of his toughest challenges ever in this issue of Batman magazine! In the final story of ‘Zero Year: Savage City,’ the Dark Knight must outwit the criminal genius of the Riddler, or Gotham City will be destroyed! Meanwhile, in Robin Rises: Omega, Batman has to take on the parademons of Apokalips to get back the remains of his beloved son with the help of Frankenstein and his sworn enemy Ra’s Al Ghul! And last, but by no means least, in Batman: Eternal, the Caped Crusader is forced to battle one of his own former protégés, Batgirl!

2014-10-27|2014-11-02.description:
DOCTOR OCTOPUS has stolen IRON MAN’S technology to get his revenge on NORMAN OSBORN.

When the IRON OCTOPUS attacks, it’s up to SPIDEY and his IRON SPIDER suit to save the day!
2014-10-27|2014-11-02.name: The Iron Octopus

2014-10-27|2014-11-02.description: America's longest-running magazine of classic comics now has twice as many pages of strips as the earlier version, on better paper, and includes 8 pages of full-color comic strips. Featuring Modesty Blaise by Peter O'Donnell and Romero: The Dark Angles, the last Modesty Blaise adventure, never published in the United States except in Comics Revue.

2014-11-03|2014-11-09.description: The team-up you never saw coming – Alfred Pennyworth and...Bane?!
2014-11-03|2014-11-09.name: Buried Deep

2014-11-03|2014-11-09.description: The penultimate chapter of “The Clamour for Glamour” poses the question, “Mary, Mary, quite contrary, how does your garden grow?” Will it be good enough to win the Best Garden at the Farm contest? Mary certainly hopes so, although an impressionable Little Lamb and his pals may be about to spoil it all, thanks to a little inspiration from a pile of Pinocchio’s favorite comic books. Meanwhile, an unplanned arrival brings Reynard and Meghan a new bundle of joys and woes.
2014-11-03|2014-11-09.name: Super-Lamb, The Just Us League of Animals, and Other Unexpected Tails: Chapter Five of The Clamour For Glamour

2014-11-03|2014-11-09.description: Pass the stuffing, cranberry sauce, and the all-new issue of GARFIELD! This month, Garfield shares some holiday cheer with the new neighborhood cats, and guest artist Nneka Myers joins us to show what happens when Nermal tries to mimic the Fat Cat and eat a massive meal before bedtime!
2014-11-03|2014-11-09.name: Thanks 4 Giving; Little Red Riding Cat

2014-12-01|2014-12-07.description: After the revelations of the last two issues, the Endgame begins! One hero retires, another reconsiders his career, and the world says goodbye to a third.
Translates Green Lantern #29 & Green Lantern Corps Annual #2.

Uk Reprint of

Superior Spider-Man Vol. 1 #29

Superior Spider-Man Annual #2

Superior Foes of Spider-Man #6
2014-12-01|2014-12-07.name: Things That make You Go Boom!

2014-12-15|2014-12-21.description: Translates Justice League of America #14 & Justice League #30.
